statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.67}+{6.84}\right)}={27.02}\approx{27.02}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.84}\cdot{6.55}={44.802}\approx{44.8}.
